title: Required Documents for University Applications
description: Learn about the required documents for university applications in Moldova. Get comprehensive information about what documents you need to prepare before applying.
keywords: required documents, university application, Moldova, study documents, application requirements

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.content: Document requirements can vary from university to university. We strongly recommend that you first gather all the necessary documents before starting your application process. This will help ensure a smooth and successful application experience.

academicDocuments.title: Academic Documents
items: High school diploma or equivalent (with apostille/legalization)

personalDocuments.title: Personal Documents
items: Valid passport (with at least 6 months validity)

languageProficiency.title: Language Proficiency
items: English language certificate (IELTS, TOEFL, or equivalent)

legalizationRequirements.title: Document Legalization Requirements
legalizationRequirements.subtitle: For International Students
legalizationRequirements.content: All academic documents must be properly legalized according to international standards:

items.title: Apostille:
items.description: For countries that are part of the Hague Convention

items.title: Legalization:
items.description: For countries not part of the Hague Convention

items.title: Translation:
items.description: Documents must be translated into Romanian or English

1.title: Gather All Documents
1.description: Collect all required documents according to the university's specific requirements. Make sure all documents are properly legalized and translated.

2.title: Verify Requirements
2.description: Double-check the specific requirements for your chosen university and program. Requirements can vary significantly between institutions.

3.title: Prepare Application
3.description: Complete the application form and prepare all supporting documents. Ensure everything is properly organized and ready for submission.

4.title: Submit Application
4.description: Submit your complete application package before the deadline. Keep copies of all submitted documents for your records.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.content: If you need assistance with document preparation or have questions about specific requirements, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is here to help you navigate the application process.
